Local wave activity calculation for Southern Hemisphere available in release0.4.0

09 Apr 2020

[hn2016_falwa Release 0.4.0] ðŸ˜„I am happy to announce that the climate data analysis in Nakamura and Huang(2018, Science) for the southern hemisphere is also available on GitHub now! (Finally, I have time to do a thorough check of the code and make the releaseâ€¦)

If you have any questions/issues regarding the usage of the package, feel free to post on the Issue page of the repo! I will help you fix them soon as I can!
